entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
